casebody.data:
JOYCE
v.
N.C. DEPT. OF CORRECTION. No. 194P03-5. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Robert Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of April 2007 by Defendant for Less Stringent Standard Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
